title: Soft lean mass

slm.description: ReadOnly, The sum of the body water mass and protein mass

units.description: ReadOnly, Unit of a soft lean mass of a person

observedtime.description: ReadOnly, An ISO8601 format time indicating when the data is observed (ex: 2016-02-15T09:19Z)
